Reactive oxygen species (ROS) are responsible for the initiation
and progression of number of human diseases such as cancer,
diabetes mellitus, atherosclerosis, cardiovascular diseases, aging,
studies indicated that, extracts fromplants could prevent or delay
the above mentioned diseases owing to their redox properties,
which allow them to act as free radical scavengers, reducing
). Along these lines, various extracts of
were studied for their antioxidant potential.

and used for wound healing activity. The aqueous and ethanol
